attributes.action: Stop the importation of animal fur/skin, for the use and production of fashion.
attributes.additional_details: It is animal cruelty, even though fur farms are illegal here, we still import massive amounts and support companies that use fur farms. Criminalising it will have a huge impact on the future use of farms by these big companies.
attributes.background: Make it illegal to import fur and skin from animal farms over seas, for the use of clothing, accessories and footwear.
